import React from 'react' import './Style/Description.css' import ShoppingCartIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AddShoppingCart'; import FavoriteBorderIcon from '@material-ui/icons/FavoriteBorder'; function Description({ src, summary, quantity, price}) { return (

Summary

Price

5

) } export default Description
